mapper.insert: INSERT INTO thirdgoal (third_mem_num, third_m_num, third_second_num, third_content, third_type, third_createDate, third_updateDate, third_good) VALUES (#{third_mem_num}, #{third_m_num}, #{third_second_num}, #{third_content}, #{third_type}, #{third_createDate}, #{third_updateDate}, #{third_good});
mapper.update: UPDATE thirdgoal SET third_content=#{third_content}, third_type=#{third_type}, third_updateDate=#{third_updateDate}, third_good=#{third_good}, third_dateOfActive=#{third_dateOfActive} WHERE third_num=#{third_num};
mapper.select: select * from thirdgoal group by third_num
